Virtual teaching will never replace the love, laughs, the smiles on students' faces, the "aha" moments that happen in actual classrooms. The quarantine isn't a break for teachers and students...it's heartbreak.
What we are missing most about students right now:
1. We miss hearing their stories.
2. We miss the way they say "Hi!" after specials (when we just saw them a few minutes ago).
3. We miss the little notes and pictures they make for us.
4. We miss them begging us to finish our read-aloud story when we run out of time.
5. We miss seeing them grow.
6. We miss their excitement.
7. We miss playing basketball, tag, or any other game.
8. We miss their hugs and high fives.
9. We miss our connections with each student.
10. We just miss telling them we love them!

Families, we miss and love you very much! Please invite other families to our page as we will continue to come up with ways to stay connected!
